name: Player vs Killy WIlly - Poppy Playtime - [Actual Mod]
name_original: Player vs Killy WIlly - Poppy Playtime - [Actual Mod]
description:
I port it to modding plus cuz I can't work with psycho engine at all. This mod is based on cartoon animation "LEGEND of KILLY WILLY... (Poppy Playtime Animation)" by Gametoons and also inspired by this mod https://gamebanana.com/mods/342042 . It's technically part of MAIN mod https://gamebanana.com/mods/285137. For covers I used FL Studio for Killy Willy and UTAU for Player. By the way, noises that Killy Willy made in his episode was not been good for cover so I used voice of Hypno from GT episode so technically Killy Willy is Hypno. 

Alternative link: https://gamebanana.com/mods/344273
